backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor with types for books, meditation sessions, journal entries, user profiles, rituals, and import/export data, and initializes a predefined list of meditation-related books.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and audio-management changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries for various frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for redeploying the frontend without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template-based troubleshooting guide for diagnosing failures in dependency installation, backend deployment, frontend build, and runtime behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container, runtime compatibility shims, and global error handlers before loading the React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, error boundary, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel to browse ambient sounds, preview playback, and adjust volume using ambientAudioManager.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays detailed error info and offers a reload button when crashes occur.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner showing sync-related errors with contextual messaging and a retry action.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Slider-based duration selector with corrected thumb positioning and labeled min/max values.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation menu with hover labels and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu for theme switching, authentication actions, and navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Popover dropdown providing filters for journal entries including moods, energy, dates, favorites, and text search.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Interactive pager that displays category pages with swipe, keyboard navigation, and animated transitions, resetting on category change.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Circular carousel for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard controls, and scaling/positioning animations.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, handles navigation, and computes results before calling a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Renders an animated 3D lotus model whose petals, glow, and motion respond to growth state values. Includes breathing, rotation, blooming, and theme‑based colors.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Creates animated particle effects around the lotus that switch between chaotic and coherent motion based on growth state. Particle count, color, and movement adapt to intensity and theme.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based lotus animation with particles and glow effects that adapt to theme, variant, and intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Circular carousel for choosing meditation types with swipe navigation and animated card scaling.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Multi-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, dot controls, animated transitions, and content parsing for a Benefits section.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular timer with animated wave edges, glow effects, and theme‑aware coloring driven by progress.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas fill indicator that animates rising water with waves, easing toward progress changes and adapting to theme.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that triggers an optional callback then navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Wraps pages with a themed background and LotusCanvas rendering behind children.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas bowl graphic showing meditation minutes as animated liquid with glow effects and theme-based colors.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js lotus growth visualization with lighting, particles, and orbit controls based on total minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus that animates breathing, glow, and petal openness using growth state, streak, and theme data.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Implements a multi‑question quiz dialog that records answers and computes a recommended meditation type. Handles navigation, state, and result calculation.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Shows a modal listing up to five saved rituals and allows selecting or deleting them. Falls back to an empty‑state message if none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Provides a swipeable carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with confirmation dialogs. Manages active index, swipe gestures, and deletion state.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login or guest status and provides logout or return‑to‑start actions. Clears cached queries on logout.
Renders a navigation bar with back button, theme toggle, session indicator, and mobile menu controls. Supports custom back behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Wraps cloud write operations with retry logic using the current actor and identity references.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a countdown meditation timer with pause, reset, seeking, duration adjustment, and completion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating books, quotes, user profiles, journal entries, and guest-mode local data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with Amazon links and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Defines interfaces for quiz questions and technique content, and exports a dataset of meditation techniques with pages and quizzes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays swipeable, theme-aware book recommendation cards with navigation controls and responsive UI handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with quotes, meditation selection, rituals, and navigation to pre‑meditation flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Manages viewing, filtering, editing, favoriting, importing, and exporting journal entries with cloud‑sync support.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Shows technique categories, detailed content, and quizzes while syncing selection and quiz scores with user identity.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that handles identity login, theme toggling, guest navigation, and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre‑meditation setup page providing mood/energy inputs, guides, ambient sound selection, timers, and session preparation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Progress dashboard showing meditation stats, rank visualization, and import/export with cloud‑sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future reflection page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future stats page.
frontend/src/utils/ambientAudioManager.t: Singleton manager for playing, stopping, fading, and tracking ambient audio globally.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and helpers to retrieve sound info and file paths.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Centralized cloud‑sync error definitions and utilities for mapping backend errors to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Utility for retrying cloud operations with readiness checks and classification of authorization vs readiness errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Serializes and validates meditation-related data for export/import by converting backend objects to safe JSON formats with stringified numbers and enums.
Manages per-user quiz scores in localStorage, including retrieval, saving, and a React hook for accessing scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes visual growth parameters for a lotus model based on total meditation minutes, using phase thresholds and smooth progression curves.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Handles guest-only meditation data in localStorage, including legacy migration, journal CRUD, progress tracking, and data clearing.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, defaulting to mindfulness for unsupported values.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and provides helpers to get current, next, and formatted rank details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning paths, extended color palette using CSS variables, custom shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for meditation and UI behaviors.
